dcterms:description: A dataset of handwritten digits used for training various image processing systems. It consists of 60,000 training images and 10,000 testing images, each of size 28x28 pixels.
dcterms:title: MNIST

dcterms:description: A dataset containing 60,000 32x32 color images in 10 classes, with 6,000 images per class. It is commonly used for training machine learning models in image classification tasks.
dcterms:title: CIFAR-10

dcterms:description: A large visual database designed for use in visual object recognition software research. It contains over 14 million images labeled with over 20,000 categories.
dcterms:title: ImageNet

dcterms:description: A synthetic dataset consisting of samples drawn from isotropic Gaussian distributions, used for testing and validating machine learning algorithms.
dcterms:title: Isotropic Gaussians
